message.content:
Given your restrictions, I've created a 7-day healthy meal plan that excludes the listed ingredients. Please note that this plan focuses on whole, nutrient-dense foods to ensure you're getting all the necessary vitamins and minerals.

**Monday**

* Breakfast: Oatmeal with coconut milk, banana, and sliced strawberries
* Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots) and quinoa
* Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter
* Dinner: Baked salmon with sweet potato and steamed green beans

**Tuesday**

* Breakfast: Smoothie made with coconut milk, frozen berries, spinach, and chia seeds
* Lunch: Turkey lettuce wraps with avocado, tomato, and cucumber
* Snack: Carrot sticks with guacamole
* Dinner: Grilled turkey breast with roasted Brussels sprouts and brown rice

**Wednesday**

* Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with avocado spread and sliced tomatoes
* Lunch: Chicken Caesar salad (use a dairy-free Caesar dressing)
* Snack: Cucumber slices with hummus
* Dinner: Shrimp stir-fry with mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, onions) and brown rice

**Thursday**

* Breakfast: Coconut milk-based scrambled eggs with spinach and sliced bell peppers
* Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted asparagus and quinoa
* Snack: Rice cakes with sunflower seed butter and banana slices
* Dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted carrots and parsnips

**Friday**

* Breakfast: Smoothie made with coconut milk, frozen berries, spinach, and chia seeds
* Lunch: Turkey and avocado wrap (use a whole-grain tortilla)
* Snack: Cucumber slices with sunflower seed butter
* Dinner: Grilled pork chop with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans

**Saturday**

* Breakfast: Whole-grain pancakes made with coconut milk and topped with fresh berries
* Lunch: Chicken breast salad with mixed greens, sliced cucumber, and cherry tomatoes
* Snack: Apple slices with coconut cream
* Dinner: Baked cod with roasted broccoli and quinoa

**Sunday**

* Breakfast: Coconut milk-based omelette with spinach and bell peppers
* Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted Brussels sprouts and brown rice
* Snack: Carrot sticks with guacamole
* Dinner: Shrimp and vegetable stir-fry (use a dairy-free sauce) with brown rice

Remember to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day. Also, be sure to check the ingredient labels of any packaged foods you use to ensure they meet your dietary restrictions.

This meal plan provides a balanced mix of protein, healthy fats, and complex carbohydrates, while avoiding the restricted ingredients. Feel free to adjust the portion sizes based on your individual needs. Enjoy your meals!
